程序包 com.google.typography.font.sfntly.table.core

类 FontHeaderTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.typography.font.sfntly.table.FontDataTable
      • com.google.typography.font.sfntly.table.Table
        • com.google.typography.font.sfntly.table.core.FontHeaderTable
  • public final class FontHeaderTable
extends Table
    A Font Header table.
    作者:
    Stuart Gill

    • 嵌套类概要

      修饰符和类型 类 说明

      Flag values in the font header table.
      static class  FontHeaderTable.FontDirectionHint
      Font direction hint values in the font header table.
      static class  FontHeaderTable.IndexToLocFormat
      The index to location format used in the LocaTable.
      static class  FontHeaderTable.MacStyle
      Mac style bits set in the font header table.

    • 字段详细资料

      • CHECKSUM_ADJUSTMENT_BASE

        public static final long CHECKSUM_ADJUSTMENT_BASE
        Checksum adjustment base value. To compute the checksum adjustment: 1) set it to 0; 2) sum the entire font as ULONG, 3) then store 0xB1B0AFBA - sum.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MAGIC_NUMBER

        public static final long MAGIC_NUMBER
        Magic number value stored in the magic number field.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • fontRevision

        public int fontRevision()

      • checkSumAdjustment

        public long checkSumAdjustment()
        Get the checksum adjustment. To compute: set it to 0, sum the entire font as ULONG, then store 0xB1B0AFBA - sum.
        返回:
        checksum adjustment

      • magicNumber

        public long magicNumber()
        Get the magic number. Set to 0x5F0F3CF5.
        返回:
        the magic number
